content: Yes, product reviews and ratings are a great advantage of shopping online. They provide customers with valuable information about the product that they may not be able to get by just looking at product descriptions and images. Reviews and ratings can give customers a sense of the product's quality, durability, fit, and overall value. This can help customers make informed decisions and avoid potential disappointments or mistakes. Additionally, product reviews and ratings can also help retailers improve their products and services by providing feedback from customers.
